entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 12:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
